website_summaries.verdict: Fun paintballs with a graffiti orange paint fill - perfect if you're looking for a unique strike color.
pros: Works equally well on the paintball field or at target practice
Gives players a high level of accuracy with many styles of guns
Uses a common .68 caliber, so it'll fit most types of paintball guns nicely
cons: Occasional shipping quality issues mean some paintballs could arrive broken

customer_reviews.title: Hidden gem
customer_reviews.text: Everyone always assumes it is the gun that makes you paint acculturate when really it is the conisitant sizing and roundness of the paint you buy. I always hear people complaining of their gun not shooting straight but yet they buy the cheapest paint possible and wonder why. Graffiti for me has always beeen my go to paint. It is decently round and sized very consistently. Give it a try and you will see. Just pay a little more for paint and you will have a lot more fun and accuracy. They paint came to me with no broken paintballs(some dimples)
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: Was OK, too many bounces
customer_reviews.text: Did not break well, but other than that was pretty good. I did a drop test took and it took about 15-20 drops to break but I did not think much about it because this paint is expensive with good reviews. I went to the field played with it, then I shot my friend a lot, next he said he got about 5 bounces. I was bouncing shots on people all day. Other than that it flew straight, had no breaks in bag or barrel so that is good.
customer_reviews.author: JEFFERY EVERSOLE

customer_reviews.title: Favorite paint, shipped well and fast from Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged well, with no shipping issues, some of the best paint to use in MagFed and normal paintball guns. Very consistent and great shooting, just as you should expect from this brand. Much better than the standard field paint, and at a reasonable price. Would always buy these from my field, if they kept a good stock, gets bought up quick unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Box came inside amazon box no damage.
customer_reviews.text: All balls unbroken, and perfect packaging. Every ball ive shot out of one 500 bag gone so far shot perfectly. No wobbles or anything just clean shots with my Tipx at all the trees in sight, ONE HANDED! Hahaha. Great paint!
customer_reviews.author: Senlo

customer_reviews.title: Orange balls of glory!
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how to judge these balls but they seem like some fine balls indeed! They fly where I want them to fly and make nice orange goo splats. I was worried about breakage but they were packed well.
customer_reviews.author: G. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm not horribly experienced with paintball, but these came in 4 bags of 500. One ball was broken in one bag. Not a big mess, but will require cleaning the others. They fly straight and hit target consistently. Occasionally, I have one that doesn't fly far, but I don't know if that's the paintball, the gun, or the operator.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Great paint!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent paint. Had one ball broken in shipping. Cleaned the rest in the bag and they had no issues from the spilled paint. Shot very straight. I had some of the longest distance eliminations I've ever had. There were a couple of bounces, but i'm not playing tournament ball. I'll take the tougher shell every time. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Paint Again
customer_reviews.text: Second case in about 2 week. Arrived with no broken paintballs in the box and no barrel breaks on the field. Awesome paint.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the results
customer_reviews.text: One of the best paintballs for the price shoot straight and accurate. And a shout out to the Amazon employees for not braking the balls when handling the package.
customer_reviews.author: MICHEL SANTIAGO

customer_reviews.title: Valken Graffiti Paintballs - 68cal - 2,000ct - Orange Fill - None Broken
customer_reviews.text: Case of Valken Graffiti Paintballs - 68cal - 2,000ct - Orange Fill, delivered in 1 day and no broken paint balls in any of the 4 packages, great deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Randy B

customer_reviews.title: not a single broken one
customer_reviews.text: All came with not a single broken one and shot well.
customer_reviews.author: Logan W.

customer_reviews.title: Great But...
customer_reviews.text: Package come as expected and everything looked great until I saw the color of the balls wasn't what I ordered. There should be an option to choose between blue balls and the yellow striped balls.
customer_reviews.author: g2fly

customer_reviews.title: if you get a good batch. The Graffiti I got from Amazon was ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid paint...if you get a good batch. The Graffiti I got from Amazon was awesome, the Graffiti I got from my field was horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Graffiti is exceptional quality paint
customer_reviews.text: No burst balls and the paint shot great as graffiti always does
customer_reviews.author: amcgee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good product. a couple of broken paintballs, but very good overall
customer_reviews.author: Ernest C.

customer_reviews.title: One of the most consistent paint I've used for this price point. Great job Valken. It's tough to manufacture a decent paint.
customer_reviews.text: One of the most consistent paint I've used for this price point. Great job Valken. It's tough to manufacture a decent paint.

customer_reviews.title: Solid ball with great flight and breakage
customer_reviews.text: These balls were very solid feeling (thick and not brittle), and circular. They bounce nicely when dropped from 6 feet, and separate nicely when thrown at a wall. When fired, they flew straight without any 'curve balls'. The paint itself is a thick orange that clearly marks the target. I used 2000 of these at the last game was very pleased with the performance. I will continue to use these in both woodsball and speedball games.
customer_reviews.author: Keith B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, well made, excellent price. Fast shipping. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stiches

customer_reviews.title: Stay with orange or yellow I did get a bad batch of white through another site it happens
customer_reviews.text: No oily residue, No broken paint, Shot straight and on target all day. Stay with orange or yellow I did get a bad batch of white through another site it happens.
customer_reviews.author: Josef Knebel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot better than the paint they sell at my local field
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: nice paintballs
customer_reviews.text: good quality, pricey, but great product. all the balls are intact and give a good 'splatter' I would get them again. hope I can find locally on sale
customer_reviews.author: marci68

customer_reviews.title: Thanks USPS!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these paintballs and was excited to try them out this weekend, but several of the balls broke open in shipping I'm assuming and contaminated most of them. I was able to salvage enough to play and the ones I used shot straight and works perfectly. I'm just bummed that almost half of them were unusable.
customer_reviews.author: PsychTech PC

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend buying paintballs via mail
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with broken balls. Wouldn't recommend buying paintballs via mail.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Briddick

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: At least 2 balls were popped in each bag .
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Doherty

customer_reviews.title: This paint won't break on people waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing paintball since 2002 the graffiti products that played with many times. This paint I wouldn't waste my money on. Too low quality paint made in Korea. Valken paint products and went downhill over the years.. good trustworthy paint these days would be GI paintballs
customer_reviews.author: Paintballer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Impressed. Best bang for your buck. My balls are consistently round. Leaves the perfect amount of my juice on their face
customer_reviews.author: Jack415

customer_reviews.title: Amazing paint
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing paintballs although you will almost never find them on sale so don't go looking for them. This paint may be good but also be sure to check out HK Army paint that is some pretty good paint.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

product_meta.title: Valken Graffiti Paintballs - 68cal - 2,000ct - Orange Fill
product_meta.description: Graffiti is a top-shelf paintball. It has great marking attributes, superior accuracy, and reliably breaks on-target. These superior characteristics have made Graffiti the world's most popular paintball. It is at home in both the woods or on the speedball field.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
